column1: Table 6-17:  Non-CO2 Emissions from Forest Fires (MMT CO2 Eq.)a

column2: a These estimates include Non-CO2 Emissions from Forest Fires on Forest Land Remaining Forest Land and Land Converted to Forest Land.
b The data for 2017 were unavailable when these estimates were developed, therefore 2016, the most recent available estimate, is applied to 2017.
